titleStmt.title: A gracious reproof to pharisaical saints causlessly murmuring at Gods mercies toward penitent sinners in explication of Luc. 15. 30, 31 / written by John Horne, sometimes minister of Lin Allhallows.
titleStmt.author: Horn, John, 1614-1676.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
